title: Rank Queue Client Crash
body: So in Dynamic Queue the client randomly crashes and it's getting very ridiculous. It happens 2-4 times a day man and I've lost 20+ LP due to it. And I refuse to believe that the only way to avoid it is to stop playing all together. Can someone please enlighten me about this.

replies.body:
Dynamic queue requires a really steady connection, and if that connection drops or gets unstable for any reason, you can drop from queue or your client can crash entirely. While there are a lot of potential causes that could be plaguing your connection, the most common solutions can be found on the [troubleshooting connections guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Please let me know if any of those steps helped.
